Interfaces for producing common pass manager configurations.

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">/// construction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// addInstSelector - This method should install an instruction selector pass,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Add the complete set of target-independent postISel code generator passes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This can be read as the standard order of major LLVM CodeGen stages. Stages</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with nontrivial configuration or multiple passes are broken out below in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="comment">/// add%Stage routines.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Any CodeGenPassBuilder&lt;Derived, TargetMachine&gt;::addXX routine may be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="comment">/// overriden by the Target. The addPre/Post methods with empty header</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="comment">/// implementations allow injecting target-specific fixups just before or after</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="comment">/// major stages. Additionally, targets have the flexibility to change pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="comment">/// order within a stage by overriding default implementation of add%Stage</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="comment">/// routines below. Each technique has maintainability tradeoffs because</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="comment">/// alternate pass orders are not well supported. addPre/Post works better if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the target pass is easily tied to a common pass. But if it has subtle</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="comment">/// dependencies on multiple passes, the target should override the stage</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Derived, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetMachineT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#aa3cda6e4a4f17e5759b544a4c7ec494c"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#aa3cda6e4a4f17e5759b544a4c7ec494c">CodeGenPassBuilder&lt;Derived, TargetMachineT&gt;::addMachinePasses</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/addmachinepass">AddMachinePass</a> &amp;addPass)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add passes that optimize machine instructions in SSA form.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#af027a2e3b2cd80c416d04bc509dd9b43">getOptLevel</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ec1bf8d7b792ca9fac56f8514db18d2a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754">CodeGenOptLevel::None</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Optimize PHIs before DCE: removing dead PHI cycles may make more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions dead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizephispass">OptimizePHIsPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass merges large allocas. StackSlotColoring is a different pass</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which merges spill slots.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stackcoloringpass">StackColoringPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the target requests it, assign local variables to stack slots relative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to one another and simplify frame index references where possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/localstackslotallocationpass">LocalStackSlotAllocationPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// With optimization, dead code should already be eliminated. However</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there is one known exception: lowered code for arguments that are only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// used by tail calls, where the tail calls reuse the incoming stack</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// arguments directly (see t11 in test/CodeGen/X86/sibcall.ll).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadmachineinstructionelimpass">DeadMachineInstructionElimPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Allow targets to insert passes that improve instruction level parallelism,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// like if-conversion. Such passes will typically need dominator trees and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop info, just like LICM and CSE below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">  derived().addILPOpts(addPass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/earlymachinelicmpass">EarlyMachineLICMPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinecsepass">MachineCSEPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(MachineSinkingPass());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peepholeoptimizerpass">PeepholeOptimizerPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clean-up the dead code that may have been generated by peephole</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rewriting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadmachineinstructionelimpass">DeadMachineInstructionElimPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Register Allocation Pass Configuration</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Instantiate the default register allocator pass for this target for either</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the optimized or unoptimized allocation path. This will be added to the pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><Highlight kind="comment">/// manager by addFastRegAlloc in the unoptimized case or addOptimizedRegAlloc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in the optimized case.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A target that uses the standard regalloc pass order for fast or optimized</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><Highlight kind="comment">/// allocation may still override this for per-target regalloc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><Highlight kind="comment">/// selection. But -regalloc=... always takes precedence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Derived, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetMachineT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#ac9d8fa0c86b7b514e80a528d85b4330a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#ac9d8fa0c86b7b514e80a528d85b4330a">CodeGenPassBuilder&lt;Derived, TargetMachineT&gt;::addTargetRegisterAllocator</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/addmachinepass">AddMachinePass</a> &amp;addPass, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Optimized)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Optimized)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><Highlight kind="normal">    addPass(RAGreedyPass());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal">    addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocfastpass">RegAllocFastPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Find and instantiate the register allocation pass requested by this target</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><Highlight kind="comment">/// at the current optimization level.  Different register allocators are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><Highlight kind="comment">/// defined as separate passes because they may require different analysis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Derived, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetMachineT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#a329811e8a7ffa3b23fecec167f9fc31f">addRegAllocPass</a>(addPass, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Add the minimum set of target-independent passes that are required for</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#a22fe41485e53804d696235cc418139d3"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#a22fe41485e53804d696235cc418139d3">CodeGenPassBuilder&lt;Derived, TargetMachineT&gt;::addFastRegAlloc</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phieliminationpass">PHIEliminationPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Add standard target-independent passes that are tightly coupled with</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Derived, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetMachineT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#a73a36580247da797a62c3609afe8e1e9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#a73a36580247da797a62c3609afe8e1e9">CodeGenPassBuilder&lt;Derived, TargetMachineT&gt;::addOptimizedRegAlloc</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(DetectDeadLanesPass());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#a9a8ef18a6785a2e0c11995308ccfba2b">Opt</a>.EarlyLiveIntervals)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twoaddressinstructionpass">TwoAddressInstructionPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(RegisterCoalescerPass());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The machine scheduler may accidentally create disconnected components</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when moving subregister definitions around, avoid this by splitting them to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// separate vregs before. Splitting can also improve reg. allocation quality.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(RenameIndependentSubregsPass());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><Highlight kind="normal">  addPass(MachineSchedulerPass());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (derived().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#a9b736691b65c34ed04d495d4e1166a39">addRegAssignmentOptimized</a>(addPass)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Allow targets to expand pseudo instructions depending on the choice of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><Highlight kind="normal">    derived().addPostRewrite(addPass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Copy propagate to forward register uses and try to eliminate COPYs that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// were not coalesced.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><Highlight kind="normal">    addPass(MachineCopyPropagationPass());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Run post-ra machine LICM to hoist reloads / remats.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
